The video was originally shared on Faceb: 2019, and has been viewed over 10,000 times.
The video: s caption mentions a crocodile found in an open nala, which translates to gutter or sewer in Hindi.
Multiple posts on Facebook: YouTube, and Twitter have shared the same video with similar claims, some stating that the crocodile was found in Dadar, a Mumbai suburb.
A local news website published a report: 2019, confirming that the video was filmed in Dadar Mohalla, Chiplun district, which is around 250km south of Mumbai.
